name: Danny Spina
summary:
I'm Danny, a web developer with a focus on building scalable and maintainable web applications.
I have 6 years of experience working with front-end and back-end technologies, and specialize in TypeScript and JavaScript.
I have a solid understanding of the latest web development technologies and frameworks such as React, Vue, Node.js and Express, and have experience working with a variety of databases like MongoDB, MySQL and PostgreSQL.
I take pride in my ability to write clean, efficient and well-documented code, and am always looking for ways to improve my skills and stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends.
I am also the host of "The Typers", the first italian podcast about JavaScript and Typescript.
